import React, { useState, Fragment } from 'react'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import Breadcrumb from "../../../components/common/breadcrumb" import {DatePickers,SelectDateWithTime,CustomDateFormat,TodayButton,DisableDaysOfWeek,SpecificDateRange,MinDate,MaxDate,DateRange,InlineVersion,DisableDatepicker,SelectTimeOnly,Default} from "../../../constant"; const DatepickerComponent = () => { const [startDate,setstartDate] = useState(new Date()) const [endDate,setendDate] = useState(new Date()) const handleChange = date => { setstartDate(date); }; const addDays = date => { setstartDate(date,4); }; // eslint-disable-next-line const setEndDate = date => { setendDate(date); }; return (
{DatePickers}
 ); } export default DatepickerComponent;
